document.full_text: crews in south carolina were working on friday to restore power to 20,000 customers after thunderstorms that also toppled a large tree on the grounds of the governor's mansion, damaging the historic house and destroying the first gentleman's car.
document.title: south carolina governor's mansion, car damaged by falling tree
lines_and_colors: crews in south carolina were working on friday to restore power to 20,000 customers after thunderstorms that also toppled a large tree on the grounds of the governor's mansion, damaging the historic house and destroying the first gentleman's car.
